text: Richard White (born November 4, 1952) is an American businessman and Republican politician. White was elected a member of the Kentucky House of Representatives in 2020. In February 2022, White was hospitalized under critical condition in Frankfort, Kentucky for internal bleeding. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1952 births Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Kentucky Category:Businesspeople from Kentucky Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Richard White (politician)
